name: Super MafiClicker Online
description:
MafiClicker Online

[in german]

HOW TO PLAY
  1. download or play via browser
  2. tell a friend to play via browser
  3. both press play
  4. click on the green circles to win

Features

  • fast games
  • sound
  • online play
  • compettetive ranked system
  • choose a button and get double the force!
  • damage display
  • singleplayer offline

in progress

  • no resetting of name
  • cpm symbol
  • close call> move buttons when enemz is low life
  • box for extra damage

info:

  • no stat save on browser! (download windows version for that!)
  • currently there is a bug, that you can not play online if you played offline!
